intro: Ischnosiphon longiflorus subsp. angustifolius, commonly known as the narrow-leaved ischnosiphon, is a flowering plant native to specific regions of South America. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
